\documentclass[grado6]{LEMA-Tikz-IM}
\begin{document}

\begin{tikzpicture}
\matrix[tablaVertical, % ver def en LEMA-Tikz-IM.sty
        % row 1/.append style={nodes={minimum height=6ex}},
        % row 3/.append style={nodes={minimum height=8ex}},
        % column 1/.append style={nodes={text width = 16ex}},
        % column 2/.append style={nodes={text width = 36ex}},
    ] (myTable) {
        {Columna A} & {Columna B} \\ % Header Row 
        $18 = 2x$ & $36 = 4x$ \\
        $17 = x + 9$ & $13 = x + 5$ \\
        $8x = 56$ & $3x = 21$ \\
        $21 = \frac{1}{4}x$ & $28 = \frac{1}{3}x$ \\
        $6x = 45$ & $8x = 60$ \\
        $x + 4\frac{5}{6} = 9$ & $x + 3\frac{5}{6} = 8$ \\
        $\frac{5}{7}x = 55$ & $\frac{3}{7}x = 33$ \\
        $\frac{1}{5} = 6x$ & $\frac{1}{3} = 10x$ \\
        $2.17 + x = 5$ & $6.17 + x = 9$ \\
        $\frac{20}{3} = \frac{10}{9}x$ & $\frac{14}{5} = \frac{7}{15}x$ \\
        $14.88 + x = 17.05$ & $3.91 + x = 6.08$ \\
        $3\frac{3}{4}x = 1\frac{1}{4}$ & $\frac{7}{5}x = \frac{7}{15}$ \\
  };

\end{tikzpicture}


\end{document}
